title: where to put codes ..in patch 6.11
body: i got a code from liking lol free riot tristana girl ...got a code after liking...but where to put that code ..i dont know becoz its a new update ...**PLS HELP!!!!!!!**

replies.body:
I should be able to help out if you can't find the code redeem option in the new store:

After you open the store, look at the upper right hand corner and you'll see a small button with a picture of a person and a cogwheel on it.  Click that, and in the new window that appears, look at the far left side and select "Redeem" right under "Purchase History".

Let me know if you have any other questions!
